TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScriptResourceMapping extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides location mapping support for script resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceMapping> object can contain a collection of mappings to script resources, such as a script file (.js). Each item in the collection maps to a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceDefinition> object by using either a name or name/assembly pair.
